events.message: John Doe has submitted an application for the Software Engineer position, highlighting strong experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The application has been categorised as Engineering based on keywords such as software engineer, backend, and cloud infrastructure.
Recruiter Emily has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process and initiate initial screening steps.
Initial screening call was conducted successfully; candidate demonstrated solid understanding of microservices and DevOps principles.
Candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm for progressing to the technical interview stage.
Technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for 2024-04-15 at 10:00 AM UTC.
